---
name: Server Setup
about: Request to Add DanBot to your Discord Server
title: "[Integration Request] Add to <your-discord-servername>"
labels: discord
assignees: dan-mcm

---

** Please provide the following information **

* Server invite link to the server you wish to add the Bot to

* Customization Requests  
  - Do you want a custom bot name? e.g. `PewDiePieBot`
  - Do you have any custom feature requests?
      * Custom image banner for welcome requests?
      * Custom welcome message?
  - Do you want any existing features disabled?
  - Timeline for integration - when do you want it integrated?
  - What are the existing bots enabled on server? (for cross-compatability investigation purposes)

* Contact information
